name: Fur Fighters Demo [SDC]
description:
REVENGE IS NO LONGER SO SWEET!

The villainous General Viggo has kidnapped the Fur Fighters' families as part of his vile plan for world domination. To make matters worse, your closest kin have been mutated to fight against you.
So get ready to lead the Fur Fighters on their mission against Viggo and his horde of psycho animal terminators.
